remarks: Equivalence of the Axiom of Choice (first form) of [Enderton] p. 49 and our Axiom of Choice (in the form of ~ ac2 ).  The proof does not depend AC on but does depend on the Axiom of Regularity.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-May-2015.)
statement:
dfac7 $p |- ( CHOICE <-> A. x E. y A. z e. x A. w e. z E! v e. z E. u e. y ( z e. u /\ v e. u ) ) $.
$d u v w x y z $.
